context_evidences: - Investigators say Moore in May 2021 initially signed an agreement with the Centers for Disease Control and Prevention to distribute COVID-19 vaccines and vaccination cards from the plastic surgery practice. Moore and Burgoyne then ordered “hundreds” of COVID-19 vaccine doses from the CDC between May 2021 and September 2022, court documents state. Reference: https://www.sltrib.com/news/2023/01/19/utah-plastic-surgeon-gave-kids/ published on 2023-01-19 19:53:07

- According to the indictment , which was unsealed on January 17, Moore, Burgoyne, Flores, and Andersen set up a scheme in which the plastic surgery practice became a legitimate COVID-19 vaccine provider. Moore signed the government's COVID-19 Vaccination Program Provider Agreement in May 2021, allowing the site to receive bona fide, government-purchased COVID-19 doses. Between October 15, 2021, and September 6, 2022, the group ordered around 2,200 vaccine doses from the federal government. Reference: https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/01/plastic-surgeon-accused-of-giving-391-fake-covid-shots-to-kids-in-125k-fraud-scheme/ published on 2023-01-19 21:34:40

- "By allegedly falsifying vaccine cards and administering saline shots to children instead of COVID-19 vaccines, not only did this provider endanger the health and well-being of a vulnerable population, but also undermined public trust and the integrity of federal health care programs,” Curt Muller, special agent in charge with the Department of Health and Human Services for the Office of the Inspector General, said in a statement. Reference: https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/01/plastic-surgeon-accused-of-giving-391-fake-covid-shots-to-kids-in-125k-fraud-scheme/ published on 2023-01-19 21:34:40

- Burgoyne would then upload the names of all purported vaccine recipients to the Utah Statewide Immunization Information System — falsely reporting that the practice had administered 1,937 doses of vaccine, including 391 pediatric Pfizer doses. That amounts to about $28,028 worth of actual vaccine doses, which the defendants allegedly drew from bottles with a syringe and squirted down a drain, documents state. Reference: https://www.sltrib.com/news/2023/01/19/utah-plastic-surgeon-gave-kids/ published on 2023-01-19 19:53:07
correction_response:
This tweet is misleading. Dr. Michael Kirk Moore Jr. and his associates are indeed facing charges, but not for heroic actions. They are accused of dumping nearly 2,000 doses of COVID vaccine, distributing fake vaccination cards, and injecting children with saline instead of the vaccine at the parents' request. This not only endangered the health and well-being of a vulnerable population but also undermined public trust and the integrity of federal health care programs. 
https://www.sltrib.com/news/2023/01/19/utah-plastic-surgeon-gave-kids/
https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/01/plastic-surgeon-accused-of-giving-391-fake-covid-shots-to-kids-in-125k-fraud-scheme/
note_1_text: Dr. Moore is charged with conspiracy to defraud the US among other charges for signing up as a vaccine provider, then destroying ~$28K worth of vaccines and fraudulently filling out ~1900 vaccination cards for profit.    https://www.fox13now.com/news/crime/utah-doctor-three-others-charged-for-covid-19-fraud-scheme
note_2_text: Dr. Moore destroyed $28,028.50 worth of government-provided COVID-19 vaccines and distributed 1,937 doses’ worth of fraudulent vaccination record cards in exchange for cash or "donations" to a specific organization.    https://www.justice.gov/usao-ut/pr/utah-doctor-and-co-defendants-charged-running-covid-19-vaccine-scheme-defraud-government
queries:

2. Dr. Michael Kirk Moore Jr saline instead of MRNA for children
3. Dr. Michael Kirk Moore Jr prison sentence
4. Legal consequences of issuing fake vaccination passports
5. Safety of saline injections for children instead of MRNA vaccines
refute_evidences: - A Midvale plastic surgeon and three other Utahns were indicted on conspiracy charges last week after prosecutors say they dumped nearly 2,000 doses of COVID vaccine down a drain, distributed fake vaccination cards — and, at the request of some parents, injected children with saline to convince the young patients that they had been vaccinated. Reference: https://www.sltrib.com/news/2023/01/19/utah-plastic-surgeon-gave-kids/ published on 2023-01-19 19:53:07

- All four defendants and the Plastic Surgery Institute of Utah were indicted on three counts: conspiracy to defraud the United States; conspiracy to convert, sell, convey, and dispose of government property; and the conversion, sale, conveyance, and disposal of government property and aiding and abetting. Reference: https://www.sltrib.com/news/2023/01/19/utah-plastic-surgeon-gave-kids/ published on 2023-01-19 19:53:07

- Federal prosecutors last week indicted Dr. Michael Kirk Moore Jr., who owns and operates Plastic Surgery Institute of Utah in Midvale, south of Salt Lake City, as well as the business' office manager, Kari Dee Burgoyne, its receptionist, Sandra Flores, and a neighbor of Moore's, Kristin Jackson Andersen. All four are charged with conspiracy to defraud the federal government, along with two counts related to improper disposal of government property. Reference: https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/01/plastic-surgeon-accused-of-giving-391-fake-covid-shots-to-kids-in-125k-fraud-scheme/ published on 2023-01-19 21:34:40

- Prosecutors noted that for minors, the group would administer shots of saline at the parents' request so that the children would believe they were being vaccinated against COVID-19. This was confirmed to one of the undercover agents, who asked about bringing in his children, to which Flores responded by handing him a note saying "with 18 & younger, we do a saline shot. Reference: https://arstechnica.com/science/2023/01/plastic-surgeon-accused-of-giving-391-fake-covid-shots-to-kids-in-125k-fraud-scheme/ published on 2023-01-19 21:34:40
tweet_image2text: A photo of a bald person smiling in front of a gray wall.
tweet_text: Not all heroes wear capes This is Dr. Michael Kirk Moore Jr, now facing up to 5 years in prison His crime? 2k fake vax passports for patients and giving children saline instead of MRNA https://t.co/xzt4f9SyKw
